long bRootBlock::bmExt
 

1a0
First bitmap extension block (hard disks only).

long bRootBlock::hashTable[HT_SIZE]
 

018
Hash table (entry block number) = (BSIZE/4) - 56. For floppy disk = 72 longwords

long bRootBlock::hashTableSize
 

00c
Hash table size (= BSIZE/4 - 56). For floppy disk = 0x48.
